item.title: Archives and Canons

item.description: What is the opposite of a canon? Perhaps an archive, which contains an overwhelming array of texts that very few people intend to read. item.title: Digitalization Project Turns a Page in African History

item.description: Dr. Livingstone, may not be such the hero we once presumed.
